data.title: Paul Hastings Advises Private Equity Consortium in Collective Sale of Controlling Shares in HCM Corporation
data.meta_description: Sale made to Japan based private equity fund J-STAR Co., Ltd and U.S. based fund Pacific Minato LP Tokyo (May 3, 2011) Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker LLP, a ...
data.text:
May 03, 2011

Sale made to Japan based private equity fund J-STAR Co., Ltd and U.S. based fund Pacific Minato LP

Tokyo (May 3, 2011) Paul, Hastings, Janofsky & Walker LLP, a leading global law firm, is pleased to announce that it has advised Grove International Partners and two leading domestic institutions, in the collective sale of their controlling shares in HCM Corporation, a provider of in-home care and retirement home services in over 60 locations in Japan, to Japan based private equity fund J-STAR Co., Ltd and U.S. based fund Pacific Minato LP.

The Paul Hastings team was led by partner Ted Johnson and senior associate Rumiko Uchida.
